job_description:
• Basic understanding of programming concepts with experience writing simple programs in at least one language.
• Identify product-specific testing requirements and build specialized tests for newly identified fail modes.
• Strong collaboration and teamwork skills with the ability to support cross-functional growth.
• Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Electrical or Computer Engineering.
• Monitor product yields and implement corrective actions as needed.
• Prior experience in a related engineering role.
• Develop data analysis software and methods to improve accessibility and usability of technical product data.
• Partner with Quality Assurance to ensure product quality and reliability meet industry standards.
